pages.text: A great source of natural $(aura) is the $(thing)moss$() on any type of mossy block. This property can be made use of in the form of the $(item)Swamp Homi$(): It will take any blocks around it that are covered in moss and remove it, leaving the clean block behind. For each block that it does this with, it generates a bit of $(aura) and spreads it into the environment.
